jump_scares.spoiler: A scary face flashes up on a laptop screen. [Video]

A bird flies out at Claire while she is opening a door
Piano keys start to play by themselves. [Video]

Claire runs into Luke as she comes down the stairs
A beer can falls down the basement steps, followed by the appearance of the old man from the bathtub standing behind Claire
